website_summaries.verdict: A good value for a replacement seat with a comfortable high back that folds down when you do not need it.
pros: A durable and comfortable seat for the price
Material and cushion are made from a good quality
Same company makes a similar seat in several camo patterns
While the material fades over time, it does not tear easily
cons: The frame and hinges could be of better quality

customer_reviews.title: Tripod stand seat upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a tripod deer stand. Very comfortable and silent. Waterproof fabric a plus seeing it’s exposed to whatever Mother Nature throws at it. Appears well made and should hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: not highback
customer_reviews.text: I really made a mistake by buying these seats. First they are not high back as advertised and second they are really small seats. They seem to be made rather professional but I am just not happy with the size of them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jim

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and dependable seats
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and dependable seats. My son and I are large guys. We use these on my fishing boat mounted on pedestals. They have held up for two seasons now and we love them.
customer_reviews.author: piefoot

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Strong and durable
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Strong and durable. I've read other reviews about people who say the seat bent when they leaned back. No such problems here. I am planning on ordering another one here soon.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: I love this seats. I can fish a lot longer now. If you want to recline in it, I won't suggest this, get a lazy boy. For the price you can't beat it. Would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Seats as described!
customer_reviews.text: I am 200 lbs and the seats work fine. Very good value. I have used them for a few months and I do keep the boat under a cover so they still look new.
customer_reviews.author: George K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the SS Minnow
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. My husband has a bad back and these make a day of bass fishing very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Highandmighty

customer_reviews.title: Not the color pictured
customer_reviews.text: Not the color you see in the picture it's more orange colored and the back hinge doesn't look real sturdy for a back rest. We'll see how it works this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Schofield

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely Comfortable. Perfect for sitting without your knees in your chest.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Works great. For the money it's a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great. For the money it's a good buy. Time will tell if the plastic frame will hold up to my 220lbs body!
customer_reviews.author: UW85

customer_reviews.title: I think they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to ride in them yet, but I have them in place and ready to use . I think they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L Kendrick Jr

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on the top of my canoe seat. No more sore back after 4-5 hours on the water. Many people said they look pretty cool too.... Thanks :-)
customer_reviews.author: tomcat

customer_reviews.title: For the price the quality was awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my boyfriend. They fit perfectly in his boat. For the price the quality was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Like the high back Option of these seats
customer_reviews.text: Really like the high back on these seats, they are quite comfortable even after long hours in my boat. They seem to be durable so far but time & weather will tell.
customer_reviews.author: countrygirl

customer_reviews.title: I give this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: I give this seat 5 stars. I ordered two and they both came in on time, and look great. Glad to have these in my boat!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but didnt make it one trip
customer_reviews.text: The seat looks good but the first time I used it one of the screws stripped out. I have tried contacting wise customer support but have yet to get a response
customer_reviews.author: Matt D

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we expected!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing whenever you "look" @ picture, you receive the product & it is exactly what you wanted! & it was easily installed!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount on my tripod deer stand and the chair camo matched the tree the stand is by!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I't is very comfortable for a day on the lake. Thanx
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 150 lbs and the seat bent all the way back. Very cheap made. Just missed the return window so that's money well wasted
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Manning

customer_reviews.title: wrong seat size
customer_reviews.text: i ordered a few seats and 1 of them that came in was not a highback as i ordered. I didn't want to go thru the hassle of returning them and having them ship the correct one as it took forever as the seats were on backorder when i ordered them originally
customer_reviews.author: justin henkel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good seats for a very good price! Shipped very fast!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McBride

product_meta.title: Wise High Back Boat Seat
product_meta.description: Wise 8WD617 Series High Back Camouflage Folding Boat Seat features Plastic Injection Molded Seat Frame, High Compression Foam Padding, 500 Denier Camo Fabric, Black Aluminum Hinges, Mounts to any BIA Standard 4 Bolt Pedestal System. 5 Year Warranty on Frame 3 Year Warranty on Upholstery.
feature_bullets: Injection Molded High-Impact Marine Grade Seat Frame with Black Aluminum Hinges
High Compression Foam Padding, 500 Denier Camo Cordura Fabric Covering
Mounts to any BIA Standard 4 Bolt Pedestal System with Included Fasteners
Dimensions - Height: 22", Width: 16.5", Depth: 18.5", Seat Depth: 14.5"
5 Year Warranty on Frame 1 Year Warranty on Cordura Upholstery

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
